nodes.text: A male human was the father of Leo Leonis, and grandfather to Leonis's children Dhara Leonis and Zare Leonis. As a child, the man was looked after by Auntie Nags, a nanny droid which had belonged to the Leonis family for many generations. Nags went on to care for Leo and then Zare and Dhara as well during each of their childhoods.
Leo Leonis's father was first mentioned in Servants of the Empire: Edge of the Galaxy, a novel written by Jason Fry and released in 2014.
